tool.name: Tesseract Video OCR
tool.description: Optical Character Recognition using Tesseract on frames of a video

param.name: vocr_interval
param.label: VOCR Interval
param.help: Interval in seconds by which video frames are extracted for VOCR

param.name: dedupe
param.label: Dedupe
param.help: Whether to dedupe consecutive frames with same texts

param.name: dup_gap
param.label: Duplicate Gap
param.help: Gap in seconds within which consecutive VOCR frames with same text are considered duplicates

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Optical Character Recognition using Tesseract on frames of a video extracted with FFMpeg. If "dedupe" option is checked, also generate AMP OCRR JSON with duplicate frames removed, i.e. consecutive frames with same texts within the specified duplicate gap.
